title: Democratic Debates, CS Lewis and the Cult of kindness
description:
Kindness is a fruit of the Spirit but it does not belong at the top of our value hierarchy. The US currently has one party that values kindness, and the other strength, and what we need is integration. I'll focus on CS Lewis' differentiation of Love and kindness as applied to Western culture today. 

CS Lewis on Love and Kindness https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/06/28/cs-lewis-love-vs-kindness/

Andrew Sullivan Dems on Immigration and declining acceptance http://nymag.com/intelligencer/2019/06/andrew-sullivan-democrats-are-in-a-bubble-on-immigration.html

Dave Rubin's Tweet https://twitter.com/RubinReport/status/1144396029090922496

CS Lewis the Problem of Pain https://www.amazon.com/Problem-Pain-C-S-Lewis-ebook/dp/B002BD2USY

The Great Divorce https://www.amazon.com/Great-Divorce-C-S-Lewis-ebook/dp/B002BD2US4

Frank Schaeffer and Brian McLaren https://youtu.be/AY1b9cc08jo
Frank Schaeffer Google Talk https://youtu.be/-33BUmx91BE
Fatal Discord https://www.amazon.com/Fatal-Discord-Erasmus-Luther-Western-ebook/dp/B0796T43YF
JBP one last question https://youtu.be/afSQZweYDts
Cruising in the Age of Consent https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/2019/07/cruising-in-the-age-of-consent/590656/
A Match made in heaven https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/posteverything/wp/2019/06/21/feature/a-match-made-in-heaven/
Rod Dreher https://www.theamericanconservative.com/dreher/stonewall-gift-sexual-revolution-lgbt/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/
